title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embedders in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion backend for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators and embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js UI, Discord bot, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and docker-compose stacks for CPU/GPU Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama; coroutines, serialization, native & JVM targets.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection friendly.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Node-API (NAPI-RS) native addon for high-performance Ollama bindings in Node.js.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model with slash commands.
